challenges.title: Is JavaScript single-threaded or multi-threaded?
choices: Threading only applies in staticly typed languages.
Threading only applies to compiled languages.

challenges.title: Which of the following is a feature provided by ES6 arrow functions?
choices: They are prone to fewer memory leaks.
Arrow functions implicitly bind this to the context where the function is written.
The only advantage is shorter syntax.

challenges.title: The use of const prevents the modification of arrays and objects.
choices: True, these are now constant values.
False, they are only references. The actual values in the array of object can still be mutated.
